WorkItem.ClosedComment: The custom rotation options only change your custom rotation DPS as shown on the stats page.The breakdown per ability uses the optimal rotation and thus doesn't change when you change the custom rotation option.
WorkItem.Description: subj says itself. When i change any of values in Custom Rotation Box, Scores don't chage. Tried on 2 PCs. Character is Березовский on Вечная Песня (EU).
WorkItem.Summary: [Rogue] Ignores CPG, finishes and poisons counting scores.
